title: Data Schema for population, demographics and regional data
description: This schema defines the properties for the geographic area and its respective population, used for simulation purposes.

fields.name: iso
fields.title: ISO Identifier
fields.description: ISO identifier in isoraster input file

fields.name: gid
fields.title: GADM ID for country/subarea
fields.description: The GID starts with the three letter ISO 3166-1 alpha-3 country code. If there are subdivisions these are identified by a number from 1 to n.

fields.name: hdi
fields.title: HDI
fields.description: Human development index of admininistrative area

fields.name: population
fields.title: Population of the country/area
fields.description: Total population in administrative area used as reference for correcting gridded population data.

fields.name: fraction_urban_pop
fields.title: Fraction of urban population
fields.description: Fraction of urban population in administrative area for correcting gridded population data
